body:
//- ============================== Mixins
include ../../../../_pug/_mixin
//- ============================== templateContainer
|
|
section(class='template-wrapper ${act}')
	aside(class = 'template-asideLeft o-aside-Item  u-animationFadeDown')
	|
	div(class='template-section m-a')
		section(class='template-content u-animationFadeDown')
			div(class='u-intructionActivity'): h6
			.row
	|
	aside(class='template-asideRight o-aside-Item')
		button(class='c-btn-IconAction u-bgIconRefresh') 
		button(class='c-btn-IconAction u-bgIconCheck')

//- ============================== Mixins
include ../../../../_pug/_mixin
// ============================== templateContainer
|
|
section(class='template-wrapper ${act}' ng-init='s_actividad = 1')
	aside(class='template-asideLeft o-aside-Item  u-animationFadeDown')
		button(class='c-btn-IconAction' data-activities-count='1' ng-click='s_actividad = 1' ng-class="(s_actividad == 1) ? 'is-active' : '';")
		button(class='c-btn-IconAction' data-activities-count='2' ng-click='s_actividad = 2' ng-class="(s_actividad == 2) ? 'is-active' : '';")
	|
	|
	div(class='template-section m-a')
		section(class='template-content u-animationFadeDown' ng-show='s_actividad == 1')
			div(class='u-intructionActivity'): h6
			.row

		section(class='template-content u-animationFadeDown' ng-show='s_actividad == 2')
			div(class='u-intructionActivity'): h6
			.row

		
	|
	aside(class='template-asideRight o-aside-Item')
		button(class='c-btn-IconAction u-bgIconRefresh') 
		button(class='c-btn-IconAction u-bgIconCheck')

//- ============================== Mixins
include ../../../../_pug/_mixin
// ============================== templateContainer
|
|
section(class='template-wrapper ${act}' ng-init='s_actividad = 1')
	aside(class='template-asideLeft o-aside-Item  u-animationFadeDown')
		button(class='c-btn-IconAction' data-activities-count='1' ng-click='s_actividad = 1' ng-class="(s_actividad == 1) ? 'is-active' : '';")
		button(class='c-btn-IconAction' data-activities-count='2' ng-click='s_actividad = 2' ng-class="(s_actividad == 2) ? 'is-active' : '';")
	|
	|
	div(class='template-section m-a')
		section(class='template-content u-animationFadeDown' ng-show='s_actividad == 1')
			div(class='u-intructionActivity'): h6
			.row
		section(class='template-content u-animationFadeDown' ng-show='s_actividad == 2')
			div(class='u-intructionActivity'): h6
			.row
		
	|
	aside(class='template-asideRight o-aside-Item')
		button(class='c-btn-IconAction openNotice is-active u-bgIconAlert' ng-click='idNotice = 1')
		button(class='c-btn-IconAction u-bgIconRefresh')
		button(class='c-btn-IconAction u-bgIconCheck')

|
	div(class="c-noticeAside" id="notice")
    article(class="c-noticeAside-body" ng-include="'unit_1/module_1/activities/a1m1a-af_notice_'+ idNotice + '"+pug_extend_output+"'")
	footer(class="c-noticeAside-footer"): button(class="c-btn-IconAction u-bgIconClose closeNotice")
template con notice and tab.description: crea una pagina con secciones y notice

body:
//- ============================== Mixins
include ../../../../_pug/_mixin
// ============================== templateContainer
|
|
section(class='template-wrapper ${act}')
	aside(class='template-asideLeft o-aside-Item  u-animationFadeDown')
	|
	|
	div(class='template-section m-a')
		section(class='template-content u-animationFadeDown')
			div(class='u-intructionActivity'): h6
			.row
	|
	aside(class='template-asideRight o-aside-Item')
		button(class='c-btn-IconAction openNotice is-active u-bgIconAlert' ng-click='idNotice = 1')
		button(class='c-btn-IconAction u-bgIconRefresh')
		button(class='c-btn-IconAction u-bgIconCheck')

|
	div(class="c-noticeAside" id="notice")
    article(class="c-noticeAside-body" ng-include="'unit_1/module_1/activities/a1m1a-af_notice_'+ idNotice + '"+pug_extend_output+"'")
	footer(class="c-noticeAside-footer"): button(class="c-btn-IconAction u-bgIconClose closeNotice")

include ../../../../_pug/_mixin
// ============================== templateContainer
div.vh100.row-flex
	div(class='row ml40 m-a')
		header(class='c-noticeAside-header')
			div(class='row mt40')
				img(src=''+appPathImage+'c_noticeTitle.png', alt='', class='u-responsive-img w70')
		section(class='c-noticeAside-section mt20')
			div(class='row')

-var arrRandom = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
	- arrRandom.sort((a,b)=>{return Math.random()-0.5})
	ul.game-mapSearch.c-gallery
		each item, index in arrRandom
			li.c-gallery-item.js-sendImage
				+image(3,9,'a1m9a-an_img_'+(index+1)+'.png')(class="game-mapSearch-image c-gallery-image" img-pareja='0' alt=arrAlt[item])
template gameClone.description: template de random modal de clon

body:
-var arrRandom = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
- arrRandom.sort((a,b)=>{return Math.random()-0.5})
each item, index in arrRandom
